D wigi i I$at Oebbi, ger lambiyya, ger tarwa n Adem, ger wid i Nebbwi akked Nue, ger tarwa n Iboahim, akked Isoail, ger wid Nenha u Nefren. Ma $oan asen issekniyen n Uenin, ad $lin knan, s imeiiawen
